---
title: "The Weeknd: Chart Performance Analysis"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(plotly)


charts <- read_csv("~/Desktop/data/charts.csv")
weeknd <- charts %>%
  filter(artist == "The Weeknd")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

p1 <- ggplot(weeknd, aes(x = as.Date(date), y = rank, color = song)) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 1) +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  labs(title = "The Weeknd: Song Rank Over Time",
       x = "Date", y = "Chart Rank", color = "Song") +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(p1)


```

```{r}
#| echo: false
ggplot(weeknd, aes(x = rank, y = song, fill = song)) +
  geom_boxplot(show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(title = "The Weekndx: Rank Distribution by Song",
       y = "Song", x = "Chart Rank") +
  theme_minimal()

```
